full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Electric Forklift - Configuration A
## Solicitation Number: 10076014
## Date of Publication: June 8, 2023
## Tender Closing Date: June 23, 2023, 2:00 PM

## Notification of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
The Public Services and Procurement Canada is issuing a Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) to solicit proposals for the acquisition of one (1) Electric Forklift, ancillary items, and Integrated Logistic Support items. This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: 
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Request for Proposal (RFP) Overview
This RFP is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A. Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified under this RFSA may refer to: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-645-75635.

## Acquisition Requirements
The acquisition requirements include:

* One (1) Electric Forklift, Configuration A
* Ancillary items:
	+ Training
	+ Integrated Logistic Support items
* Dedicated delivery to PSPC – Receiver General & Pension Branch, 5370 271 St, Langley BC, V4W 3Y7

## Delivery Schedule
The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned requirement is July 31st, 2023. Training must be completed within three (3) weeks following delivery.

## Proposal Submission and Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria for this acquisition include the lowest aggregate price per configuration. Proposals will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the requirements outlined in this Notice of Proposed Procurement.

## Contact Information
Cassandra Khastar, Contracting Authority
Email: [Cassandra.khastar@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Cassandra.khastar@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Telephone: (343) 550-1634

## Document Availability
The solicitation document and all relevant attachments are available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6258/10076014--npp-english-and-french.pdf.

## Timeline
The tender closing date is June 23rd, 2023
